More convenient PC microphone Complete USB Microphone Kit

If multiple people buy this can they podcast together? They can podcast together. But don't plug multiple microphones into the same device, because microphones of the same model will have the same serial number, and the computer can only recognize one of the serial numbers. Does it have a software? It is plug and play. Does this microphone need to be right up to your mouth for good quality or can it be overhead, off to the side, etc? It is recommended that you face the logo on the front of the microphone when using the microphone. Since the microphone can pick up the front sound very well, good quality can be obtained.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Carbon Black USB microphone from Caattiilaa, and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance and quality. This microphone has proven to be a fantastic addition to my home recording setup.First and foremost, the sound quality of this microphone is exceptional. It captures audio with incredible clarity and accuracy, making it perfect for recording vocals, podcasts, voice-overs, and even musical instruments. The microphone's sensitivity and frequency response ensures that every nuance and detail of the sound is captured, resulting in professional-grade recordings.The ease of use of this USB recording microphone is another standout feature. It is a plug-and-play device, which means it requires no complicated setup or additional drivers. Simply connect it to your computer via the USB cable, and you're ready to start recording. This simplicity makes it suitable for beginners who may not have extensive knowledge of audio equipment.The microphone also comes with a sturdy and adjustable stand, allowing you to position it at the optimal angle and distance. The stand is stable and well-built, eliminating any worries of the microphone falling or being knocked over during recording sessions.In terms of durability, the USB recording microphone feels solid and well-made. It is constructed with high-quality materials, giving it a premium look and feel.Overall, I highly recommend the Carbon Black USB microphone from Caattiilaa. It delivers exceptional sound quality, ease of use and compatibility with various recording software and systems. Whether you are a professional musician, podcaster, or voice-over artist, this microphone is a worthy investment that will undoubtedly enhance your recording experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great studio microphone
reviews.reviewText: Nice microphone for the price, very professional looking and sounding. Easily mountable and adjustable. Price was very competitive. I think its a great piece for a beginning streaming setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very clean and sturdy design
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this mic and I have had no issues arise. The setup is easy and the material is sturdy. Though I have never owned a microphone other than this one, the sound quality is crisp and it picks up sound at almost every angle. The only real reason why I bought this microphone was because of Prime Day and the fact that it was 40% off. For the price I paid, it was worth every dollar. However, I can’t say for sure if it is worth the full $50.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a charm!
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect upgrade at an incredible price. The sound quality is crisp and clear when recording, and my friends no longer have issues hearing me on Discord. The assembly was quick and easy, and it even came with two P protectors so I could choose which I liked better. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a good budget set up.
reviews.reviewText: I'm just getting in to streaming and content creation, so I couldn't see spending a fortune on top-of-the-line gear. I purchased this item because of the included articulating mount. Everything seems to be of good quality and the mic sounds good to me. I'm sure that I will upgrade at some point, but this was a cost effective starter set and has served its purpose well. This kit includes everything that you will need to get sound in to your computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For Price
reviews.reviewText: This is an awesome mic! Sound quality is great all my online gaming friends can hear me great, and set up is relatively easy! I (sadly) lost the instructions to build it but it was extremely easy to figure out, and it's very quick to move around as well. I do recommend that you have a solid surface to attach it to, cause you have to have it pretty tight (I especially recommend NOT attach to a glass desk), but otherwise it's practically perfect! My friend is even thinking about getting this same one and I'll make sure to let her know how wonderful it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was playing my video game and talking. The quality is great. But the problem is on a random day the mic set randomly broke down🤨

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended! tightening bolts could be more ergonomic
reviews.reviewText: For the price, if you need a desktop or counter mounted microphone that does it's job. You won't regret buying this. The sound quality was a major improvement over my previous head set. And it can be used for gaming with some freedom of sound output, due to it focusing it's recording range towards you rather than a full 360 Degrees.One issue that I did have and could be an easy fix is the tightening bolts. Which makes the mount stay in place firmly. Specifically the flower shaped bolts that are found on the arm's base. it is difficult to tighten it with your fingers, due to it being shaped like a flower. if it were shaped like all the other tightening bolts, which are shaped like a proper handle, then it would be significantly easier to properly tighten so that the mount is not loose.If you used a grip wrench, you could tighten the base properly, however you could also damage the bolt handle at the same time.If these problems are not a concern to you, then you should still definitely buy this for casual high quality recording or even more professional recording if you are looking for a good deal.
